Counter-Strike doesn't really have much to explain. It's a competitive 5v5 FPS that requires communication and teamwork to play efficiently. In this game, your team matters just as much as you do.
[h1]DISCLAIMER[/h1]
Using a non-prime account (Free to play), you may encounter a lot more cheaters than if you had purchased prime status. It's a definite recommendation if you enjoy this game to purchase prime status.
Some of the community is also toxic, although it seems to have changed slightly.
